  
BLOCK ELEMENTS TEST

FROM XML:
<xslTutorial>
<BLOCKQUOTE>this</BLOCKQUOTE><BLOCKQUOTE>rocks</BLOCKQUOTE>
<BLOCKQUOTE>this</BLOCKQUOTE>
<BLOCKQUOTE>rocks</BLOCKQUOTE>
<BLOCKQUOTE>this</BLOCKQUOTE>
<BLOCKQUOTE>rocks</BLOCKQUOTE>
<BLOCKQUOTE>this</BLOCKQUOTE>
<BLOCKQUOTE>rocks</BLOCKQUOTE>
<SPAN>this</SPAN><BLOCKQUOTE>rocks</BLOCKQUOTE>
<SPAN>this</SPAN>
<BLOCKQUOTE>rocks</BLOCKQUOTE>
</xslTutorial>
